    • Constructor Detail

      • JRepository

        public JRepository(java.io.File directory,
           java.lang.String name)
            throws NotDirectoryException
        Parameters:
        directory - this file should point to an existing directory. The folder can have or not a git repo already.
        Throws:
        NotDirectoryException - if the file specified does not lead to a directory then an exception will be fired. The reference to the file will not be kept in the JRepository.
